Introduction

Chaerin is a South Korean singer under KM Entertainment. She debuted as a member of the girl group ICHILLIN' on September 8, 2021 with the digital single "Got'ya"

1
Chaerin's nickname is "Chaeni", because when she was little, she couldn't prounce her name so she said it as "Chaeni".
